thread.section_title: SSENSE Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SSENSE | ssense.com
thread.title: David

author: David
title: David
text: I have shopped with Ssense for several years now and cannot find fault with any of my transactions with them. All orders come quickly and well packed. All returns have been received without any hesitation and the funds involved paid back immediately. Knowing this allows for greater ease when you aren't sure of sizing or even if the product will suit. However, I have kept and been happy with the vast majority of my purchases.
